name: Whole Network
description: Whole Network is a value Internet based on a new working mechanism, which will really solve the problem of transformation, empowerment and transaction of user behavior value in the new blockchain network. And through the chain record of the user's behavior, to realize the link between the real world human behavior and the virtual world value transformation. As the carrier of Whole Network consensus dissemination and cohesion -- "Whole Network fuel" NODE is generated by users' behavior and contribution to ecological construction, mainly obtained through the use of triangle blockchain mobile phone. NODE is like the combustion of ecology, which promotes the operation of "ecological engine" and maintains the stable operation of ecology.
